title: Client completely busted
body:
So, I'll try to keep this short, 
Logged into EUW, patched 6.17, played a few games, all fine, went to EUNE on my main account, patch redownloaded (500mb + 80mb), tried playing an ARAM match.

 Couldn't connect at all, checked out the forums, they done goofed on EUNE it would seem, aight, I try going back to EUW, scanned some files, boom, antivirus (AVG) reports a virus in the files, tell it to ignore, now the client won't open at all, I can't get to the repair option, it just does not boot at all.

Whatever you did, fix this shit, come on...

replies.body:
If your Antivirus is scanning and removing files from the League directory, you may not have set up exceptions for League yet. I recommend working through our [Firewall Troubleshooting step](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) from our connection guide to see if it resolves this problem.

Let me know if this helped.
